title: Save hours of time
subTitle: Eliminate the hassle of writing your cover letter. Simply input your information, select a template, and download the letter directly from  your dashboard.

title: Create a cohesive application.
subTitle: Enhance your application by pairing your cover letter template with a matching resume template, making it stand out to hiring managers and employers.

title: Harness the power of AI technology.
subTitle: Our software extracts information from authentic job advertisements, then analyzes and rewrites it to generate compelling sentences for your  personalized letter.

title: Experiment with various templates.
subTitle: Save your cover letter from the dashboard and try it with different templates. The appropriate cover letter template can significantly impact your application.

title: Navigate past applicant tracking software.
subTitle: Every aspect of our builder, from the templates to the content generator, was designed to circumvent the software that companies use to filter out candidates.

title: Seek expert recommendations.
subTitle: The Ask the Experts feature offers insights from certified career coaches on your completed letter. Gain valuable advice on  perfecting each section to increase your chances of securing more  interviews.
